Detailed Description

Dynamic vector of pointers. Use this vector to store generic pointers.

void* uStreamLib::PVector::operator[] (  uint32  idx  )  [inline]
 

Operator [] to get the ith pointer. Please note that you must lock the vector before using this operator and then unlock it when done.

Parameters:
idx index of the pointer to get.
